title: The difference between the Church and Court of Rome, considered in some reflections on a dialogue entituled, A conference between two Protestants and a Papist / by the author of the late seasonable discourse.
author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
publisher: Printed by Andrew Clark for Henry Brome ...,
notes: Attributed by Wing to William Lloyd.
